g.text: Back EMF: ε = -L(di/dt), Energy: U = ½Li²
M = k√(L₁L₂), where k is coupling coefficient
Self-Inductance: Inductors in filters, energy storage, chokes in AC circuits, fluorescent lamp ballasts
Mutual Inductance: Transformers (power distribution), wireless power transfer, induction heating, coupled circuits
Both phenomena are fundamental to electromagnetic devices and AC circuit analysis
